original_title: 名前は言えませんが割とメジャーです。超有名アイドルグループにいたあの子。独占AVデビュー。 朝日しずく
overview: I can't say the name, but it's a major one! ] That child who was in a super famous idol group is finally on the AV stage! What if I take off the idol costumes I've been wearing so far! !! Natural'boke's beard Mako! When you hold the meat stick microphone, your cute face is greeted with white sperm ... Love juice drips from the crack, and the pink grain nipple always erects. Iki tide Ahegao that is embarrassing and can not be shown to fans is fired from beginning to end! Das! Exclusive! Real idol AV debut!
title: This Girl Was A Member of A Major Idol Group. We Can't Tell You Her Name, But She's A Pretty Big Deal. See Her Exclusive AV Debut. Shizuku Asahi
